author: Chaim Gartenberg
description: YouTube TV, Google’s over-the-top streaming service, just got an update for its iOS application that adds support for Apple’s AirPlay functionality.  When it launched a few weeks ago, YouTube TV...
title: YouTube TV now supports AirPlay, so you can use it with your Apple TV

author: Jörn Brien
description: Zeit totschlagen auf Facebook, Twitter oder Youtube? Nicht mit Todobook. Das Plugin für den Chrome-Browser bekämpft Prokrastination und befördert das Erledigen von Aufgaben.
title: Todobook: Dieses Plugin bekämpft Prokrastination auf Facebook, Youtube und Twitter

author: Tess Townsend
description: And YouTube is getting more local ads options.
title: Google is adding more automation to its tools for marketers

author: Freia Lobo
description: You can now use Photos, Keep and YouTube TV with your family
title: Google is getting a lot more family friendly

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/kellie-scott/6830306, http://www.abc.net.au/news/lucia-stein/7093484
description: Fake news circulators seeking social media fame use the Manchester bombing to launch false posts about gunmen, dead YouTube stars and missing children.
title: Missing kids and other 'cruel' fake news circulates after Manchester attack

author: Natt Garun
description: Facebook is now opening up the ability for users to invite a friend for a collaborative broadcast. Think of it like a Hangouts on Air via YouTube Live (what a mouthful!) — you can ask a Facebook...
title: Facebook Live now lets you add a friend to live stream together

author: t3n Redaktion
description: Anzeige: Ihr habt euch schon immer gefragt, wie Fynn Kliemann mit zwei linken Händen und großer Klappe zum Youtube-Heimwerkerking mit 330.000 Abonnenten werden konnte? Fragt ihn doch selber!
title: Von Startups, starken Frauen, dem Heimwerkerking und der Blockchain
